exercises.description: Apply Timestamp to solve a real-world problem

sections.background: Add a timestamp field to the original table, and update the value of the timestamp field every time while modify the table data. When extracting data, determine which data to extract by comparing the value of the last extraction system time and the timestamp field of each record.

metadata.concept_definition: Add a timestamp field to the original table, and update the value of the timestamp field every time while modify the table data. When extracting data, determine which data to extract by comparing the value of the last extraction system time and the timestamp field of each record.
